Package com.flipfit.business

Interface FlipFitGymOwnerService

All Known Implementing Classes:
FlipFitGymOwnerServiceOperations
public interface FlipFitGymOwnerService
Interface representing the operations that a FlipFitGym Owner can perform. Includes methods for adding gyms, viewing owned gyms, validating gym owners, and updating gym owner details.

  • Method Details

    • addGym

      boolean addGym(FlipFitGym gym)
      Adds a new gym.
      Parameters:
      gym - the FlipFitGym object to be added
      Returns:
      true if the gym was added successfully; false otherwise

    • viewMyGyms

      List<FlipFitGym> viewMyGyms(int gymOwnerId)
      Views the list of gyms owned by a specific gym owner.
      Parameters:
      gymOwnerId - the unique identifier of the gym owner whose gyms are to be viewed
      Returns:
      a list of FlipFitGym objects owned by the specified gym owner

    • validateGymOwner

      boolean validateGymOwner(String email, String password)
      Validates a gym owner's credentials.
      Parameters:
      email - the email of the gym owner
      password - the current password of the gym owner
      Returns:
      true if the email and password are valid; false otherwise

    • createGymOwner

      boolean createGymOwner(FlipFitGymOwner gymOwner)
      Creates a new gym owner.
      Parameters:
      gymOwner - the FlipFitGymOwner object containing details of the new gym owner
      Returns:
      true if the gym owner was created successfully; false otherwise

    • updateGymOwnerPassword

      boolean updateGymOwnerPassword(String email, String password, String updatedPassword)
      Updates the password for a gym owner.
      Parameters:
      email - the email of the gym owner
      password - the current password of the gym owner
      updatedPassword - the new password to be set
      Returns:
      true if the password was updated successfully; false otherwise

    • updateGymOwner

      boolean updateGymOwner(FlipFitGymOwner gymOwner)
      Updates the details of an existing gym owner.
      Parameters:
      gymOwner - the FlipFitGymOwner object containing updated details of the gym owner
      Returns:
      true if the gym owner details were updated successfully; false otherwise

    • getGymOwnerIdByEmail

      int getGymOwnerIdByEmail(String email)
      Retrieves the unique identifier of a gym owner based on their email.
      Parameters:
      email - the email of the gym owner
      Returns:
      the unique identifier of the gym owner

    • updateSeatCount

      boolean updateSeatCount(int gymId, int startTime, int seatCount)
      Updates the seat count for a specific gym slot.
      Parameters:
      gymId - the unique identifier of the gym
      startTime - the start time of the slot
      seatCount - the new seat count to be set for the slot
      Returns:
      true if the seat count was updated successfully; false otherwise

    • updateGymDetails

      boolean updateGymDetails(FlipFitGym gym)
      Updates user details.
      Parameters:
      gym - the FlipFitGym object containing updated gym details
      Returns:
      true if the gym details were updated successfully; false otherwise
